faqs.q: Do you integrate with CRM systems?
faqs.a: Yes, Triotech integrates with Salesforce, Zoho, and HubSpot.

faqs.q: Do you support Hindi and English?
faqs.a: Yes, all products are bilingual and support Hindi + English.
